Method.name: Map
Method.Description: read strings from MR.Base.Iterator and count words
Method.Implementation:
#dim id As %String = MapInput.GetNext() #dim o As MR.Sample.Person = ##class(MR.Sample.Person).%OpenId(id) quit:'$isobject(o)
do MapOutput.Emit(o.Age, "Sum", o.Contacts) do MapOutput.Emit(o.Age, "Count", 1)
